UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Short and Robust Anti-Infective Lipopeptides Engineered Based on the Minimal Antimicrobial Peptide KR12 of Human LL-37.
Literature.Author: Narayana JL, Golla R, Mishra B, Wang X, Lushnikova T, Zhang Y, Verma A, Kumar V, Xie J, Wang G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5-50µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=6.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=3.1µM)
